COMMENT_TX: $Delmon Young's bouncer in front of the plate was grabbed by Buster Posey; Young stood in the batter's box and was tagged by Posey
$Pablo Sandoval becomes the fourth player to hit three homers in one World Series game

$Prince Fielder and the ball arrived at the same time; catcher Buster Posey stood in front of the plate, caught the ball and applied a sweep tag on Fielder; Fielder's lead foot was in the air and did not touch the plate; Posey tagged Fielder before his back leg touched the plate; the Tigers were upset at the call
$Gregor Blanco's line drive struck Doug Fister on the top right part of his head and caromed into CF

$Gregor Blanco's bunt rolled down the 3B line; three Tigers walked with it hoping it would roll foul; it stopped between the line and the edge of the grass; HP umpire Dan Iassogna ruled it a fair ball and Drew Smyly picked it up
Tigers second baseman Omar Infante left the game due to a non-displaced fracture of the fifth metatarsal in his left hand
